data:
Hey, I'm a Quality Assurance Analyst with a passion for digital content and web development. I work for the Royal College of Nursing where I've had the opportunity to create digital content for members and improve their experiences with our website. In the Projects section there are examples of various digital projects I've worked on. In my spare time I enjoy learning programming languages like HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Python.I also created my own music blog app called Realm 87 using Next.js and React.
GitHub: @willbyars1987 //
Website: (https://www.realm87.com) // 
Email:
 willbyars1987@gmail.com

Below are some examples of digital projects I have worked on. In each
instance, I looked for gaps in our digital offering and created content to
fill those gaps, with the aim of enhancing and improving our member's digital
experiences.
I worked with the Professional Leads of the Counselling Service to produce a Mental Health and Wellbeing section for the website, providing a range of helpful guidance and support for members.
View on RCN website ↗ I produced online career guidance for nursing staff working in the independent sector, which is one of the RCN's key priorities.
View on RCN website ↗ I created members-only content to encourage joining the RCN. One example was a downloadable sample Supporting Statement to help nurses and midwives applying for jobs.
View on RCN website ↗ I created a section for Nursing Support Workers to support their career development including a range of resources and guidance on different career pathways.
View on RCN website ↗ I created a webpage for members who are looking to improve their IT skills. I previously worked as a RCN Adviser, and from speaking to members I was aware that some struggled with IT systems. When I worked as a Content Editor I took the opportunity to try and help with this.
View on RCN website ↗
